app.name: LibreShop With Music
app.short_description: Download homebrew apps but you get music
app.long_description:
LibreShop is an app that lets you download Homebrew apps onto your Wii.
By default, apps are downloaded from the Open Shop Channel apps repository.
Controls: HOME - exit A - engage B - back Up, Down - move Left,Right - move by page
On the repository screen, press 1 to open the settings. Tails1154 added the homebrew browser music to it
